item.title: Follow the Prophet
item.description:
Follow the Prophet by Elder J Ballard Washburn, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Evening of 160th Semiannual General Conference on Sun Sep 30 1990
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder J Ballard Washburn, Of the Seventy

item.title: The Temple Is a Family Affair
item.description:
The Temple Is a Family Affair by Elder J Ballard Washburn, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Morning of 165th Annual General Conference on Fri Mar 31 1995
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
